item.title: Convert wildcard SSL to Java Keystore Format (JKS)
item.description: Today we need to get a wildcard SSL certificate into a Java Keystore format. First copy everything you need to a /tmp folder. There are  gd_bundle.crt  , domain.com.crt and domain.com.key
